metadata.title: CVE-2021-45451 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Mbed TLS before 3.1.0, psa_aead_generate_nonce allows policy bypass ororacle-based decryption when the output buffer is at memory locationsaccessible to an untrusted application.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
